item.title: Free Sites to Receive SMS Online
item.description: Many web services nowadays require a phone verification system. They send a verification code to your cell phone number that you have to enter on the website. If you do not feel comfortable of receiving a SMS every time you sign up for an online service, there are numerous websites that could help you to receive that specific SMS on a Computer.
